frame.name: Rite
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame concerns rituals performed in line with religious beliefs or tradition.
<ex>In certain <fex name="Desired_state_of_affairs">fertility</fex> <t>rites</t> <fex name="Place">in Burma</fex> , a woman desirous of offspring is required not only to approach the King Cobra but to plant a kiss on its mouth .</ex>
<ex><fex name="Member">He</fex> was <t>ordered</t> <fex name="New_status">a priest</fex> <fex name="Time">in 1944</fex>. <fex name="Leader">CNI</fex> </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Leader
FE.definition:
<def-root>This is the religious or cultural leader who performs and/or leads the rite.
<ex><fex name="Ldr">The medicine man</fex> performs this <t>ritual</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Member
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Member</fen> describes the member of the religious or cultural group who participates in/undergoes the rite.
<ex><fex name="Mbr">Joe</fex> received <t>communion</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Organization
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Organization</fen> identifies the institution in which the rite is prescribed.
<ex>His <t>baptism</t> <fex name="Org">into the Catholic Church</fex> is scheduled for next Sunday.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action that is taken to perform the ritual.
<ex>A building is <t>consecrated</t> <fex name="Mns">by anointing the doorposts with special oil and saying certain prayers</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> used to perform a particular rite.
<ex>We <t>baptise</t> children <fex name="Instrument">with holy water</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Desired_state_of_affairs
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the state which the rite is hoped or intended to bring about. <ex>They performed a <fex name="DesS">fertility</fex> <t>ritual</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>The type of ritual or ceremony being performed.
<ex>We performed the traditional <fex name="Type">marriage</fex> <t>rites</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Object
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE indicates an object on which a rite is performed.
<ex>The priest <t>blessed</t> <fex name="Obj">the wine</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: New_status
FE.definition:
<def-root>Rites may confer a <fen>New_status</fen> on a participant (e.g. rank, membership).
<ex>Elliott was almost <t>ordained</t> <fex name="NStat">as a priest</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Guardian
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Guardian</fen> is the member of the <fen>Organization</fen> who instigates the rite for someone of which they are a guardian.
<ex><fex name = "Guardian">Mr. and Mrs. Wilson</fex> <t>baptized</t> their son.</ex></def-root>
